item.description:
Allston is the only city neighborhood in the country named after an artist: Washington Allston.

Be a part of a series of art-inspired networking events. Discuss aesthetic, craft and talent by crawling with fellow artists and architects as part of larger open artist studio events. After visiting local studios, the party will head somewhere nearby for food or drinks. If you can't make the party, you can visit the Allston Open Studios from November 13 - 14, 12-6pm.

Meet outside 119 Braintree Street Studios at 1:30 pm

For more information contact Rebecca McWilliams at rmcwilliams[at]smma.com.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside 119 Braintree Street Studios at 1:30 pm
item.name: Architects and Artists Collaborate: Allston Open Studio Crawl
